name: lidia
description: Linguistic Diagnostics:  a database with arguments from the linguistic literature that have been adduced to argue in favor of or against a linguistic property or construction ( grammatical relations, syntactic categories, part of speech tags, ..)
author: UU Digital Humanities Lab

scripts.postinstall: yarn fyarn && yarn install-back && yarn install-func
scripts.test: yarn test-back && yarn test-front && yarn test-func
scripts.start-front: yarn fyarn stop && yarn front yarn serve
scripts.start-back: cd backend && python manage.py runserver --settings glue --pythonpath ..
scripts.livereload-back: cd backend && python manage.py livereload --settings glue --pythonpath ..
scripts.start: yarn start-front & yarn start-back & yarn watch-back
scripts.collectstatic-p: cd backend && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput -v 0 --settings collect --pythonpath ..
scripts.static-p: yarn build-p && yarn clean-static && yarn collectstatic-p
scripts.start-back-p: cd backend && python manage.py runserver --settings production --insecure --pythonpath ..
scripts.start-p: yarn static-p && yarn watch-front-p & yarn start-back-p
